itemCount:
Number of items displayed above the results in all pages except home and about pages.

Parameters:
* $1 - a number or '1 million +'
classPlaceholder: Placeholder for the search field on home page
browse: Statement below the search field on home page
noFiltersDefined: Displayed on items page when no properties are defined for the class.E.g.:Blood(Q7873)
addFilter: Link to add filters. Displayed on items page when more than 40 properties are defined for a class.
viewQuery: Link to Wikidata Query Service present at the bottom of all pages.
noItems: Displayed on items page when no items are found for the given class and applied filters. E.g.:Blood(Q7873)
displayItemsError: This is an error message which is displayed on items page when a SPARQL query times out and returns no data.
gettingValues:
Text displayed on every page while data is being fetched. 

Parameters:
* $1 - filter name. E.g: Getting values for filter genre ...
noAdditionalValues: Message displayed on filter values page if no more values exists for a filter.
filterError:
Error displayed on filter values page when getting filters for a class times out or throws some error. 

Parameters:
* $1 - filter name,like genre
filterTimeout:
Note displayed on filter values page when fallback results are given due to timeout of SPARQL query.

Parameters:
* $1 - filter name,like genre
selectValue:
Message to select a value for a filter, displayed on filter values page.

Parameters:
* $1 - filter name,like genre
selectAdditionalValue:
Message to select more than one values for a filter, displayed on filter values page. 

Parameters:
* $1 - filter name,like genre
noValue: Predefined value for a filter to signify no data exists for that filter. Present on filter values page.
changeClassNote: Warning given on subclass and superclass pages to the user.
viewList: Link to return to items page present on subclass, superclass and filters page
results:
Number of results displayed alongside every value on filter values page.

Parameters:
* $1 - a number
applyLinkedFilter:
Text displayed on filter values page for additional linked filters.

Parameters:
* $1 - filter name,like genre
chooseLinkedFilter: Message displayed when linked filter dropdown is open.
